response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your daily experiences. Considering its exceptional features and benefits, we believe it's worth more than its face value. To make this opportunity accessible to you, I'm offering it at a special introductory price of $150. This is an exclusive offer, so don't hesitate to seize it while it lasts. If you have any questions or need further information, please let me know. I look forward to hearing your response.", "product_price": 150}
